Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay at the beach”
Reviews.Author: pennyandtony
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here the Aug.19 thru 25, we had only planned on staying 5 days but at the last minute decided to stay an extra night!!!! The Guest service manager Lisa Corliss was very helpful in setting this up for us!!!! Everyone from the staff that worked at the front desk( Lisa, Rebecca and several others), restaurant and cleaning staff were very nice and helpful!!!!! We ordered room service a couple times for dinner and it was excellent and they were very prompt, Frank does an excellent job managing the restaurant!!!!!! I would recommend staying here at Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites for your next visit to Daytona! The rooms were very spacious and VERY CLEAN.....big deal for us!!!!!!! Just want to thank everyone for making our stay AWESOME!!!!! We also appreciate Leah Klindt, general manager for making sure everything went well!!!! Again thanks guys, Penny and Tony George Flatwoods, Kentucky

Reviews.Title: “Awesome customer service!”
Reviews.Author: Jodie E
Reviews.Content: It seemed like Lisa Corliss went above and beyond to make sure our stay was perfect! Great job Lisa! We also had room service two nights and they did an excellent job on that too! All around great place to stay-hightly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Great Labor Day Getaway”
Reviews.Author: smetko
Reviews.Content: Hurricane Issac changed our travel plans at the last minute. We actually headed to Daytona Beach without a hotel chosen. As a Priority Club Rewards member, I thought to contact Holiday Inn first. We searched all 3 Daytona properties. Upon calling this site, I found Rebecca to be super helpful. She succeeded in giving us a better option than we could find online. Once we arrived, she said, "Oh I remember you," when she heard my last name. Throughout the weekend, everyone was friendly and attentive: from desk staff to maintenance to housekeeping. Even the bartender thought to grab my beach towel that I left on my bar stool and kept it for me. She was off duty by the time I came down to retrieve it, but helped with a smile. Great time, and a relaxing weekend was had by our entire family. By the way, very clean hotel, including the ample parking lot across the street. Scott

Reviews.Title: “Wow! Totally unexpected!”
Reviews.Author: Jeff P
Reviews.Content: Our extended family had been vacationing at this hotel for years, and although my work had brought me to Daytona Beach many times, I was staying at what many consider to be "higher end" hotels. I was somewhat reluctant to make a reservation there, but my sister-in-law had blocked a number of rooms for a post-wedding event, so we decided to joined them. What a surprise! The employees were so fantastic and we really enjoyed meeting all of them! From Diana N., our bartender, to Lisa C. working the front desk, everyone made you feel like we were part of their family! The rooms were very clean and roomy! We had an ocean front room and were even offered a free upgrade! Jeff P.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay! Great staff!!!”
Reviews.Author: Janine R
Reviews.Content: My husband and I did not plan on staying at the Holiday inn, we had reservations at the Desert Inn next door. The Desert inn was so nasty and dirty we knew we could not stay even for a minute. We walked over to the Holiday inn and asked if they had any open rooms and they did!! I will always remember Chris and Ashley who were working that afternoon, they were so nice. When we walked into our beautiful room I started to cry, the room was so beautiful and clean. With everything we would need and more! We loved the view of the ocean, the pool area was so beautiful and clean and the bar was great. The bartender Alena Stevens was the best, she went out of her way to make sure we were happy and having a good time. We also enjoyed the servers Jessica and Robin. Thank you Holiday Inn and the wonderful staff for making our stay perfect!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Cindy G
Reviews.Content: We were in Daytona taking our son to college and stayed here a few days before drropping him off. The hotel was very clean and in a great location. The staff was helpful and courteous. The rooms were comfortable and we had a great view of the beach. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Repeat customer from PA.”
Reviews.Author: Rick W
Reviews.Content: I have been bringing my family to this hotel for years. The "entire" staff has always been extremely helpful, polite, nice and courtious. The hotel and its facility is very clean and is very updated. The hotel is located on the beach with a great view of the ocean and the sunsets and sunrises (its very relaxing to sit on the balcony and enjoy the views). The hotel also has a nice menu selection of food for breakfast, lunch, dinner and well priced. Also we enjoy the saturday grilled lunch on the outside patio over looking the pool, ocean and the music entertainment. The hotel is convientley located close enough to the boardwalk, the daytona 500 race track, the local water park (Daytona Lagoon) and only 1 hour from Disney (for a nice one day trip). If you are considering a trip to Daytona Beach FL, I'd strongly suggest you to book your hotel stay at the Holiday Inn Hotel and Suites at 930 North Atlantic Ave, 32118... I would be very surprised if you were unhappy with your stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT STAY!!”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer J
Reviews.Content: Me and my family stayed here for a weekend and it was very clean and the staff was very friendly. In face we are staying again this coming up weekend for labor day!! I booked somewhere else and I canceled my room becasue the gave me a better deal here and it ws much cleaner.

Reviews.Title: “Beach time fun”
Reviews.Author: Here4aGoodtime
Reviews.Content: We decided that a two day stay by the beach on our way to Orlando was a great last minute idea. Great pick of hotel! Staff was friendly, we checked in after a long drive from Ontario, when we arrived at our room we discovered that the AC was not working, not a good thing on a hot humid August night. The front desk quickly moved us to a near by unit. Hotel is right on the beach, with lovely heated pool. Beds were comfortable, as we had three teens with us the pocket door gave all of us some privacy. Breakfast was pretty good and offered a varied selection- waffles were a hit with our teens. Would like to include a special thanks o Rebecca for all her efforts in looking for my daughter's eye glasses.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, great people”
Reviews.Author: Bill C
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with my stay at this Holiday Inn. The lobby looked great, the people were incredibly friendly & helpful, and the room was spacious, clean, and had a great view. I'd recommend this Holiday Inn to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel stay”
Reviews.Author: joan f
Reviews.Content: Everyone on the staff was great and the rooms and all the ares were immaculate. i will be back to Daytona beach many times BUT only if there is room at the INN !!!! Thanks everyone for a great vacation. Joanie F.

Reviews.Title: “What an awesome hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Johnny M
Reviews.Content: The staff, especially Ashley & Ryan were great! They made us feel like we were the most important guests they had. They made booking our travel much easier than other hotels did and backed it up with a great ocean view just as promised. Thank you for making our 2 day trip memorable and enjoyable. Thanks again and we will be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Hotel BY Far!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jcrow1060
Reviews.Content: I don't even know where to begin to start with my review on this hotel. I wish I could rate it more than 5 stars First let me start off by saying that the staff in this hotel is outstanding . They are friendly and always go out of their way to make sure you are kept happy throughout your stay. Let me mention a few staff members that I dealt with. Ria and Ashley are the sweetest nicest girls that I have met at a hotel front desk, always greeting us with a smile and accommodating us with whatever we needed. The management is top notch. Lisa one of the managers is exceptional. She constantly made sure each and everyday that we were happy with our stay. She and the staff are what you would say exemplifies excellence in customer service. This is a VERY spotless hotel, maid service did an amazing job in making sure our room was clean in fact the entire hotel is kept impeccable. Our room had an amazing view of pool and beach. Pool is outrageous , kept very clean, Very friendly bartenders , incredible drinks. This is a very family oriented hotel, we met many nice people during our stay. I visited the Hilton right down the street and it is a nice hotel no question about it but I would never choose it over the Holiday Inn just because it is a bigger and more elite. Holiday Inn and Suites really lives up to its standards. Hilton is way to big and chaotic. Holiday Inn is very friendly and they really take an interest in keeping their guests satisfied. Location is so much better at the Holiday INN because its not located on the boardwalk as the Hilton is so its a much more calm location, but yet a short distance to boardwalk. I have become a priority club member because I am more than happy with my experience with this hotel making my families vacation so enjoyable. I HIGHLY recommend this hotel, I can assure you that you will be more than satisfied.with your stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Expression of Kindness”
Reviews.Author: Deb Y
Reviews.Content: We want to convey our gratitude for the compassion and concern that was extended to us by the host onduty on the day that we checked in. It is refreshing to witness and experience this expression of kindness from two young men who seemed to actually care about our needs. The Holiday Inn is ver fortunate to have these two young men on their staff. Chris & Ryan may the Lord bless you for your acts of Kindness. Sincerely, Fredric and Deborah

Reviews.Title: “Customer service at it's finest!”
Reviews.Author: Mikecandace11
Reviews.Content: My husband and I planned a "last minute" trip to Daytona from TN. We were more than pleased to find this location. Immediately Chris found us the perfect room and went out of his way to offer his suggestions on their Excellent restaurant as well as attractions in the area. We somehow lost both of our IDs and the whole staff was so thoughtful in helping us track them down, especially Ria. She phoned us immediately when someone turned them in. We highly recommend this hotel and look forward to coming back very soon due to their outstanding customer service. This location was far more outstanding than the same hotel in Clearwater. Thanks Chris and Ria! You won us over!

Reviews.Title: “Lives Up to the Hype”
Reviews.Author: JCPlatinum
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about the service and quality of this hotel. We traveled at night and while driving I called the front desk to ask about early check in for the hotel. Ria explained that they were full up the night before due to family reunions at the hotel but she would be passing the message down to Lisa (Guest Services Manager) and they would try to get us in before the normal 4 pm check-in time. I knew from our reservation service weeks before (see review Outstanding Reservation Service) that Lisa would work her magic and get us in before our scheduled time. Traveling with a baby is an experience in itself and with us arriving at 12, we just wanted a room and some rest. Our stay started off great upon arrival. Lisa and the exceptional housekeeping staff had our room ready 3 hours ahead of schedule. She introduced me to the General Manager of the hotel, Leah, and they made sure to let us know where to come should we have any issues. After a few initials and a signature, we were in our rooms in a timely fashion for such a busy hotel. When we got to the room, as someone who lives on the road, I did what I always do when I first walk into a room; turn the beds down and look in the shower for hair. Housekeeping had it on the spot! As a matter of fact, this group of professionals were constantly cleaning this hotel and walking around with a smile on their face. I only got to know Leroy seeing how the man lives with a mop in his hand. You will find him constantly mopping the floors down in the lobby. The only issue we had with our room was our refrigerator went out, something that is beyond management's control. A quick call to the front desk and Ryan had their technician Nelson up within 5 minutes with a replacement. Nelson was very welcoming and professional and liked to talk about helicopters, especially Black Hawks. Please pass on the thanks to him for the talk! Their restaurant was an enjoyable and soothing place to go in the mornings for breakfast and sit outside listening to the ocean. We had Meridith both times we went and she was always accomodating to make sure we had a good experience. We will definately book again at this hotel if we are ever in the Daytona area. This place echoes leadership from Leah to Lisa down to the rest of the staff. We got to know these people very well and Leah took time out of her busy day to play with our son in the lobby, something that impressed me even more. I'm going to be very suprised if Leah and Lisa are not moving up the ranks within the company and maybe onto IHG soon. I'm sure I will see you ladies outside of Daytona sometime at other HI's. There's a lot of behind the scenes and names we didn't get to know, but please pass our thanks down to the staff for making our first family trip a memorable one.

Reviews.Title: “Accommodating”
Reviews.Author: themcgillsinsc
Reviews.Content: After unsuccessfully searching for an available room to sleep five people I reserved a room at this hotel through HOTELS.COM. Upon checking in, we were disappointed when the room that we had paid for only accommodated four people. Chris at the front desk was very helpful and offered us a rollaway bed at no charge. The room was also city view instead of oceanview. Chris suggested that we call the front desk early the next morning for any oceanview rooms that may come available. I called the front desk and Lisa said she was confirming rooms then and would call me back. Within 15 minutes, Lisa had us an oceanside room with a rollaway bed at no charge for the remainder of our stay. I would definitely recommend this hotel as it was clean, accommodating and a safe location. The friendly, helpful staff saved our vacation. Thanks again, Chris and Lisa for going the extra mile.

Reviews.Title: “Mills Family Reunion 2012”
Reviews.Author: Sharon M
Reviews.Content: The Holiday Inn Daytona Beach- Oceanfront provided the Mills Family Reunion a great service this weekend 7/20 to 7/23. Special thanks to Tracy, Lisa, Jessica, Robin, Miguel, Meline, Frank and to ALL the staff that service us with a smile...Thanks!!! Customer service was great across the board and any problems that may have arise was rectified right away in a professional manner...Thanks!!! The hotel was very clean from the lobby to the rooms, pool area, the ball rooms and resturant/ bar area.... I will refer this hotel to family and friends........ Again I say THANK YOU for helping to make our Family Reunion a Great Success......Sharon & Steve Mills

Reviews.Title: “Dodged a Bullet”
Reviews.Author: Taylor B
Reviews.Content: Wanted to book a beach front hotel near the Ocean Walk/Pier area for by girlfriends birthday. Already knew without a doubt this is where I wanted to stay by the reviews/pictures. We drived almost 3 hours for our trip and started the day at Ponce Inlet to visit the lighthouse and eat lunch on the water. When it was time to check in we arrived at the hotel to find out our reservation was cancelled and the entire hotel was fully booked. We were told my card was not authorized (which didn't make sense since it was a my debit card with plenty in my account) and they tried to call me but my number was invalid (which also didn't make sense because she read the number on file and even called it in front of me and my cell rang). Mistakes happen but the fact that we were stranded was about to ruin our whole vacation & my girlfriends birthday. Lisa, the Guest Services Manager was very sympathetic and promised to call if anything became available. We left extremely disappointed with plans to drive back home. Just as we reached our vehicle ready to leave, I received a call from Lisa inviting us back in. She not only pulled the strings to give us a room, but also gave us vouchers for free breakfast for the inconvenience. Our following stay exceeded expectations. Hospitable service, clean facilities, bar, pool, courtyard, excellent breakfast. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kathy S
Reviews.Content: After having reservation at the Desert Hotel, upon arrival me and my husband was very disappointed and refused to stay one night there. My husband and I walked next door to the Holiday Inn, it being after 9pm we didn't know if we'd be able to get a room, but Ashley working the front desk had us set up in a room within like 2 minutes! Our 1st night was on the inside 5th floor, wonderful room. The next morning my husband went to front desk and asked Chris about a balcony room ocean view, in less than an hour we were moved! Over all wonderful time. Bartenders were excellent, food and service was great! We will return to this hotel again and recommend to all our family and friends! Thank you Holiday Inn, it was a pleasure!

Reviews.Title: “A+ HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: frqnttrvlr123
Reviews.Content: This was not my 1st stay and won't be my last. Rms were upgarded since July 2011. new carpets, beds, furniture, tvs. this is my 1st choice hotel and I always leave satisfied. Housekeepers do a great job - all interaction was pleasant. Front Desk sand mgmt staff all attentive, personable and acknowledge by name. Kudos to Lisa, Ria, Chris - who did I miss?! Thanks to all - -

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Jaspa59
Reviews.Content: I have been attending both the Daytona 500 and the Coke Zero 400 race for several years now and usually have tried to stay closer to the track. Last summer I decided to stay at the beach. Being a priority club member I searched the Holiday Inn web site and found this hotel. The hotel exceeded my expectations and had a great time during that stay. I decided to return this summer to stay again and stayed July 4th thru 8th. I was concerned being the 4th of July the hotel was going to be busy. Upon check- in I was assisted immediately and my room was ready. When I went to my room it was clean and the air conditioner was on making the room comfortable. The balcony had two chairs and a great view of the ocean and the pool. During my stay I used the pool and restaurant. The pool deck has plenty of chairs for guest and it was clean and free of litter. I ate breakfast each day and it is particularly nice to be able to eat out on the patio looking at the ocean. When returning back from the track at 10:30 at night the kitchen was still open and food was available in the bar. The hotel also had a DJ out by the pool on Saturday afternoon and the chef was grilling burgers, hot dogs and chicken sandwiches. I had a hamburger and it was not your usual frozen ground beef patty but you could tell it was fresh ground beef. I complimented the chef and he told me be prepares the burgers himself for grilling. I use Holiday Inns a lot for business travel and the staff here is one of the nicest of any I have met. When I checked out I made my reservations for the Daytona 500 in February 2013 and hopefully will return in the fall for little get away. I would recommend this hotel. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding reservation service”
Reviews.Author: LifeLikeAGypsy
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't usually throw in a rating on a hotel before I actually check in to it, but I just wanted to let the rest of the viewers know what an ease and no brainer it was to book with this hotel. A lot of you are going to check the reviews on here and from being priority members, most are going to price check down the beach with these Holiday Inns through the best rates. You can't beat this place! Lisa, the Guest Service Manager, has a little magical wand she waves and somehow next thing you know, you're giving your priority club number for reservation and envisioning what a great time you're about to have on the beach because you've already saved money before stepping on the sand. I would highly recommend this hotel for Priority Club members, especially platinum that have to live in these places for a living and know what good customer service is when you receive it. Also, they will work with you on supplementing your points into your stay (ex. using one or two reward nights and being able to stay in your same room). My wife and I cannot wait to stay at this place from the customer service we've already recieved and from reading the reviews. Hope this helps a lot of you from having to call all over the beach to research rates. I promise you, if you give Lisa a chance, you won't make a second call!

Reviews.Title: “Sounds too good to be true”
Reviews.Author: Krista_B30710
Reviews.Content: While traveling with my daughter on a 10 day vacation to 3 locations, all at HI's, this hotel outshines the rest. New Orleans and Gulf Shores Holiday Inn's were nice but hand's down, Daytona Beach excelled in hospitality, service, and location. The staff must be grilled daily on service. The luggage trolley was giving me fits and an employee stopped his cleaning to assist me into the elevator. That's only one example but the bottom line is...this hotel is clean, bright, cheery, and caked with personality. I wish I had written down names of exceptional employees but I do remember two. Leah will help with reservations or your hotel expectations, whatever they may be. Alison is a bar/server in the dining area and nailed refills (103 temp HOT day) by the pool. I can't praise them enough. Thanks for making our memories exceptional!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Trina G
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a week while we were house hunting in the area, and everyone was so helpful and kind. Lisa, the Guest service manager, went above and beyond in accommodating our needs! The restaurant and bar staff was excellent as well, thanks, Brandi. Great service from everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: Dawn G
Reviews.Content: This was our second year staying at Holiday Inn & Suites in Daytona Beach. For 20 years we went to the same "Mom & Pop" motel that is now closed. We had a hard time finding a place that had the same type of staff, amenities, and clientele. Every staff member we encountered at Holiday Inn & Suites was friendly and helpful. The atmosphere is family friendly! The restaurant has great food. The rates are competitive with like hotels. I love this hotel and can't wait to go back next summer!

Reviews.Title: “Help when needed.”
Reviews.Author: David F
Reviews.Content: I have to book my hotels through my company. I was to work in Daytona for 3 days then the weekend and 4 days the next week. Rather than fly back home I wanted to stay on points for the weekend. My wife was traveling with me. I had the first days booked but was told I could not stay on points for the weekend. The Guest Services Manager, Lisa worked her magic and I was able to stay in the same room for the entire stay which made my wife relly happy. This is my first stay of many stays at this hotel due to the extra effort she made for me. I will be periodically working in Daytona for the next year and will book this hotel each time.

Reviews.Title: “Staying at Heaven on earth”
Reviews.Author: Randy H
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel 3 times a year, and it is extremely beautiful.I am so relaxed when I am there that I don't want to leave. Lisa, the manager of the hotel, is the best. I travel all over the country doing auto shows for GM, and Lisa is in my top 3 for favorite hotel managers.This is one of the best hotel experiences I have had all year. The staff and managment gets a big hats off from me .THANK YOU RANDY HEAGY

Reviews.Title: “"Awesome Vacation at the Inn"”
Reviews.Author: Yolanda L
Reviews.Content: Greetings to the staff of the Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Daytona Beach! My family and I had an "awesome" stay at your property. The rooms were very clean and the oceanfront view was great. Whenever my family and I came in contact with any member of the staff we were greeted with a warm, welcoming smile, and kind words. Enjoyed several meals at the Seaside Cafe! Look forward to staying with you all again!!

Reviews.Title: “First Time going to resort. June 22-24, 2012”
Reviews.Author: Perry G
Reviews.Content: Based on all the reviews, I have read about this resort, my family and I have chosen to spend a weekend there..Hope all reviews are correct. My family and I are looking forward to a great time....

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: amygreer
Reviews.Content: Rooms are nice and have great ocean views. Can hear the surf. Every single staff member, from front desk, to maintenance, to cafe staff, have been outstanding. Even the caulking and wall texture is done well!

Reviews.Title: “" The best place to stay on Daytona Beach"”
Reviews.Author: Twana S
Reviews.Content: Ashley was so pleasant at the check-in desk. The rooms were nice, clean, and relaxing. I enjoyed every minute at the Holiday Inn & Suites. I will return next year for vacation!!!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT room on 4th Floor”
Reviews.Author: rgarrettjog
Reviews.Content: I stayed on 4th Floor also and room was Very Clean and newly remodeled. It was Great, staff very friendly and helpfull if needed.

Reviews.Title: “The Best of Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Shirley J
Reviews.Content: I having been going to this hotel twice a year.....once in the spring and again in the fall for the past 5 years. Everyone there is so professional and friendly. The rooms have recently been renovated, and the cleanliness of the hotel inside and out is excellent Everything you need is right there from the lodging to the food, (which is exceptional) and a pool bar. The rates are very reasonable along with the prices for the food and drinks. This is a family resort and I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “If you stay once...you will come back...”
Reviews.Author: usmctnlrat
Reviews.Content: Ten years ago i tried several other beach front properties. Then I stayed at the Holiday Inn & Suites. None of them measured up to the quality of service, friendliness of the staff, and cleanliness of the facility that I found in this hotel. This still holds true today. This property has recently (Jan.2012) gone through a complete renovation. I have recommended this hotel to many business associates and friends. All were impressed not only with the hotel and staff but with the rates as well and have made repeated trips, not only for business but for vacation as well.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Overall”
Reviews.Author: Brian P
Reviews.Content: I'm more of a Marriott/Hyatt person, but I stayed at this property for three nights. We had booked a king and were upgraded to a King suite. Room was spacious and clean and appears to have been renovated somewhat recently. Overall a very good experience for a Holiday Inn. Positives: Free parking Courteous Staff Pool bar offers reasonably priced drinks/bar food Choice of firm/soft pillows Right on the beach Free wi-fi Negatives: A/C unit is a bit loud Oceanview Suites do not have balconies All in all, this hotel was a good value and we wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to others visiting Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: Hpytravlr
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights and got the inclusive Breakfast buffet. This paid for me and my wife and the kids eat free. Very Nice! The rooms were the best part and the maid service did their jobs. Parking is spare and as always some people just leave their cars parked and never move them. I just parked across the street and it was no big deal. Bigger spots actually. Hotel was clean and you saw lots of employees walking around cleaning. The waitresses can be a bit slow and parking is all the cons I can think of. Desk staff knew their job and did it well.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice!”
Reviews.Author: Keri C
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review from my hotel room at this hotel. My husband and I were thoroughly impressed with this establishment. The rooms are very clean and are new and updated. The staff goes out of their way to do whatever you need from the. We originally booked for two nights and decided two days before leaving we wanted to arrive a night earlier. I tried to modify my reservation to find there were none of our room available and we would have to book a different type that was not oceanfront for our first night. I called 1-800 number to be told the same thing. I then called the front desk and a very nice woman named Rae was so helpful. She was able to work something out and move some things around and make the adjustment for us to add an extra day to our vacation. Housekeeping was prompt and reliable. We have nothing but great things to say about this establishment. We are already planning our return next year for spring break.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL SPRING BREAK !!!!”
Reviews.Author: TRAYCER208
Reviews.Content: This week I took 2 Teenage girls for Spring Break and wanted to be near the "strip" part of the beach side THIS IS IT ! The staff is AWESOME !!! even though they are "at work" in such a pretty place, (Daytona Beach) they are so helpful. The room we had was on the 4th floor WONDERFUL OCEAN front view The Room was VERY clean , spacious & the beds are fab TOO !Can't say enough NICE things about our time with them.We give FIVE STARS !!! Trayce ~ Atlanta , Ga

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: Sade47
Reviews.Content: I have to say this hotel and it's staff turned an awful beginning into a happy ending. I wanted to treat mu elderly mom and aunt to a nice weekend retreat. I had reserved another hotel in the area but upon arrival they didn't have the room nor did they try to find alternative accommodations. This is where Holiday Inn into the picture. I called frantic and spoke to Chris H at the front desk and explained the situation. He immediately went into help mode and was able to secure the last room they had (it was during spring break). When my mom finally arrived he acknowledged her right away and both he and the staff (Lisa C and Kim) made sure they had the best accomodations and service for the duration. The report came back five stars on their service. I plan to go there personally soon to experience the same. Thank you Chris, Lisa, and Kim for everything. YOU ROCK

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: brad b
Reviews.Content: Spent 5 days at the HI for Daytona Bike Week and had a wonderful time.Our group had 4 rooms total and no complaints.The breakfast was especially good and we kept the bartenders pretty busy.The rooms were clean and our request for xtra towels was always granted promptly.The location was superior if being pretty close to Main St means anything to you.They had bike washing stuff set up which was convienent too...Its not the Ritz Carlton its a Holiday Inn afterall but for a HI its one of the best weve stayed at...Also the staff was extremly friendly and helpful and never without a smile..special hats off to Chris !!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome experience”
Reviews.Author: C L
Reviews.Content: This is one of the cleanest hotels that I have stayed at in a long time. The hotel staff were exceptional and so very familar with the area. The pool, patio and beach access were all wonderful. We plan on coming back with some teenagers in April for their spring break. You will not go wrong staying here, it's well worth their price.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, awesome staff!”
Reviews.Author: dave b
Reviews.Content: Stayed here the other day and was very impressed with the hotel & staff. We made a rez for one night as they were fully booked on day 2 of our trip. No problem with an early check-in and ample parking too. We didn't think we had a chance for a room day 2 as bike week was in full swing but Lisa kept us informed and eventually not only got us a room, but we were even able to stay in our king ocean front room we were in day 1. Every staff person we met was friendly & helpful - front desk, housekeeping, bar tenders, even the waitresses were helpful with our less than mainstream dietary needs. Free WiFi worked great - rooms had coffee maker & fridge too. Everything just exceeded our expectations - highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Our Beachside Wedding”
Reviews.Author: HeidiLahey
Reviews.Content: We were married in the gazebo out back by the ocean on Valentine's Day. They helped to make it the most beautiful event of our lives. They handled everything. The night of the wedding they made sure everything ran smoothly and all we had to do was enjoy our party. The stay in our room was very nice too. Everything was clean, plenty of parking, & easy to find for my guests. My guests all said how beautiful it was and how impressed they were.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best”
Reviews.Author: Chuck O
Reviews.Content: They are very strict about checking in @ 4pm. we had gone to the beach earlier that day & wanted to take a shower & a nap. tried to check in @ 1pm & told they would call us. tried @3pm even b4 we could ask the lady said not till 4 b4 we could speak. so we had a drink from the bar & took a nap by the pool. came inside @ 3:50 & saw other's getting turned away till 4pm. as it did turn to 4pm only 1 person checking in a bunch of pp is not a good idea either. so we waited to get called & nothing till 415 when we walked up there. that's when we got our coupon 4 the bar thinking we could of had it earlier while we waited. When we did get into our room it was alright bird crap all over the patio & couldn't lean on the railing b/c of it. there was a big crack in our shower & jaquzzie tub that makes u think u checked in with another hotel. The fridge was not even so every time u opened it sumthing would spill out. now since our room was in the corner it was next to the Broiler or A/C because in our bedroom u could hear a burrr noise every so often that will keep u awake if ur a lite sleeper & we couldn't really sleep the whole time. @ this time the hotel was getting a remodling so the noise didntt stop till sum time after 6:30 ( that's when we left to get dinner ). When we did wake up around 8ihs we could here the workers return by 9 & working on the building so no sleeping in here or nap after breakfest. the bill was under our door early in the morning like they need us to get out soon ? over all we wont be back. it had a jaquzzie that had more than enough hot water ( thank you ) the Breakfest is good I recomend the pork chops ! the main reason why we wont be back is the no check in till exactly 4pm or later with the other reason that was told to us was of ur room is still being cleaned. not being remodling or while u wait here is a coupon to our bar 4 a drink or 2.& that parking across the street will get ya killed during busy season !

Reviews.Title: “Great Sunrise”
Reviews.Content: We had a great time and the was room was 95 % upgraded. The staff was great the food was great, you have to try the philly cheese steak.

Reviews.Title: “a must stay for a good rpice and excellant service”
Reviews.Author: buzz1953
Reviews.Content: excellant professional and curteous staff , great views and although still remodling it was No incovieninece and the rooms were to a very high standard and quiet. Food was good and resonably priced. very able to care for seniors and families alike. General manager made a point of see our needs were met and offered upgrades and both welcomed us and invited us to stay again. really kool!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous beachfront hotel”
Reviews.Author: slburton3
Reviews.Content: My husband stayed here with business associates. The location was awesome, right on the beach. Service was great, the guy who did the check-in was very polite. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Relatlives loved it”
Reviews.Author: river6575
Reviews.Content: Kudo's to Leah Klindt who made sure all our relatives had great accommodations and a relaxing time. We booked quite a few rooms as relatives poured in to attend a memorial for my husband. Every person who stayed there was incredibly impressed. I'll recommend this spotless, comfortable hotel to anyone who asks.

Reviews.Title: “big, clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: DrjkovarikTeqeusta
Reviews.Content: The location is great, but then there are dozens of oceanfront hotels. What struck me was how clean everything was. And my room seemed much larger than at most business-oriented hotel chains (eg. Marriot, Hilton).

Reviews.Title: “Great staff!”
Reviews.Author: Lewayy
Reviews.Content: I never knew a Holiday Inn could be so nice. Our room was very clean with a great view of the ocean! The staff went out of their way to help me, even letting me use the personal computer in the office to print off of! We had some drinks in the bar & they were very reasonable in price. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Holiday Inn and Suites, Daytona Beach, Florida”
Reviews.Author: Leonard B
Reviews.Content: We rented a room for two with ocean view to attend our nieces wedding, also held at the same hotel. The check in was quick and efficient and the room had a king sized bed as promised. Everything about our four day stay was perfect. The room was immaculate and well supplied with all the necessary amenities. The view was directly facing the beach (although a higher floor would have have had a nicer view). The breakfast was quite good and at a very reasonable price with quick service and a smile. The best part of our stay was dealing with the excellent, caring, and very knowledgeable staff. Whenever we needed any directions to restaurants, newsrooms, or other sites of interest, the desk staff either gave us excellent advice right off the cuff, or got directions on the internet or the telephone right then and there. Speedy service with a gracious smile and pleasant manor, AND precise. All in all a great place to stay if you need a room in Daytona Beach. Certainly the best place we have found there in over thirty years of travel there to visit family. We will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean & Roomy”
Reviews.Author: SadieMarie
Reviews.Content: Just got back from Daytona Beach. Stayed there before. The Holiday Inn is very clean with a great view of the ocean. The boardwalk & Pier are about a mile stroll down the beach. The Pier is closed for renovation but is expected to reopen in spring ( call to make sure as reopening has been an ongoing projection). The hotels food was good (breakfast) & they have a nice big pool with a large lounging area plus a covered outside bar area if weather is "iffy". Close to resturants & stores.The staff is always friendly & accommodating. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Second visit and WE WILL definitely be back”
Reviews.Author: Terry D
Reviews.Content: When you arrive, you are immediately taken in by the cleanliness in appearance and fresh smell. Reminds me of trips to Hawaii. Front Desk people (especially Leah, Lisa, Helene, Eric and Chris) and restaurant personnel (Bonnie and friends) were some of the friendliest and accommodating we have ever experienced. Very helpful finding and arranging dinner plans and guiding you to activities (golf, day trips, etc.). We were on the fifth floor and the view was fabulous. Our room was beyond clean; spotless every day and smelled fresh. This isn't your every day Holiday Inn Express. We have visited Daytona Beach for 40 years and this is a place to return to every year.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly service, but not worth the price”
Reviews.Author: dpladyreed
Reviews.Content: The positives: well-decorated, spacious room. Super-friendly guy at check-in, and great bartender. Nice poolside bar. Negatives: The toilet seat had three large bright drops of dried urine on it. There is no way anyone could've missed seeing that nor was there any way a guest could avoid sitting on it. I wiped it off and covered the seat with toilet paper whenever I used the toilet. It obviously hadn't been cleaned at all. The double-queen oceanfront room is a misnomer. It really should be called ocean view. The way the building is constructed, our room sat back behind the pool and another wing of the building, so there was no expansive view like you would normally get with an true oceanfront room. Sitting on the balcony in the cheap $10 molded plastic chairs gives you an eye-level view of the giant top bar on the balcony railing. I couldn't see the beach at all when I was sitting down. It turned out to be pointless to pay for the "oceanfront room" since I'd have to stand up if I wanted to watch the waves or the people walking on the beach. The pool is nothing special, and there's no hot tub. It's my own fault for not verifying that there wasn't a hot tub but I assumed that for a hotel of this price and caliber, that there would be at least one. There's certainly ample room on the grounds. I was going to complain about the urine upon checkout, but there was one girl working alone, she was stressed about computer problems, and there was a line of people waiting behind us to check out. If she had asked "how was your stay?", I would have told her, but she didn't. Rather than delay everyone's departure even longer, we simply paid and left. For $180 (including tax) for one night, I expected more. This hotel is worth half that price. I felt duped.

Reviews.Title: “MR <M”
Reviews.Author: francis m
Reviews.Content: GREAT PLACE TO STAY! very good staff and good food.

Reviews.Title: “Best Vacation”
Reviews.Author: PattiPRN
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at this Holiday Inn. The staff was so friendly, the room was always clean andwe had a magnificent view from our room and balcony. It was amazing to be able to walk out of our room, through the pool and right onto the beach. It was the most relaxed my family has been in months. We would highly reccommend this as a fantastic place to stay. Normally our vacations involve visiting family up north, but this year we didn't have the money to travel that far with all of us, this was the perfect alternative. There was lots to do, the staff had great ideas for restaurants and kid friendly activities.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Silk1021
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very spacious and have a microwave and mini fridge. The ocenview room is the best. The property is nicely kept and in a great location. The food in the restaurant was great too. Like I said, great hotel!! Enjoyed my stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: mespos
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted to spend a few days on the ocean for our anniversary. This hotel was extremely clean and made for a very pleasant stay! The building is "old Florida retro" in styling with the curved hallways and all. The rooms have been refurbished, the paint is fresh and the property is kept very clean. We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to spend some time right on Daytona Beach. We had an oceanfront room with balcony overlooking the sea and loved sitting out at night to listen to the ocean. The moon's reflection on the sea was breathtaking, my hubby loved driving the car on the beach during the day and breakfast outside on the veranda overlooking the water was so picturesque. Nice well kept swimming pool as well. Also enjoyed drinks and nachos at the bar; their food was very good. Would recommend "Barnacles" for dinner if not dining at hotel. The Inlet Harbor Restuarant down at the Ponce Inlet also very good; a fun tropical colorful place to dine. Only suggestion we would have would be if "trop rock" type music (like Jimmy Buffett) was played on the intercom outside.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Good but city/businesses need to work on sound ordanance.....”
Reviews.Author: anchorsandstars
Reviews.Content: Our first trip to Daytona. We went to spend a few hours at the beach outside the hotel. The noise from the other hotel pool areas was unreal. All you could hear was 2 or 3 other DJ's/music where we sat. It was obnoxious and not pleasurable. We had our 12 year old with us and the music that was coming from one of the other pool areas was rap that included very ugly language. Not appropriate for a family environment. Beach Patrol was running up and down the beach. I don't know if there is any noise ordanance, but you really shouldn't have to listen to all that mess. It shouldn't be heard outside that hotel area. Not impressed with Daytona. We know it is not the fault of the hotel we stayed in. All the hotels should be considerate to the fellow businesses around. It really did ruin the stay at the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Safe, quiet & clean- enjoy the roar of the ocean from balcony day or night!”
Reviews.Author: LaughTravelLove
Reviews.Content: SAFETY is a MUST on the oceanfront, here you can safely enjoy your balcony view at night, evening stroll down to the pool, or bar & grill in a very clean, quiet, nicely decorated piece of paradise. I am a 2nd time visitor to Daytona Beach- I stayed here the first time & wished I had the 2nd time! There is nothing like watching the sun come up over the Atlantic ocean, or the way a midnight moon dances on the water with the roar of the seas so loud at night you cannot hear yourself breathe! The hotel is beautifully lit & decorated like a little tropical hideaway. The rooms are cleaner than most & well maintained with eye pleasing furniture & decor!! *The beds, a big deal for me, are VERY NICE & clean; they are covered with the nicest of soft linens, none of those funky large comforters here (you know the ones hotels never wash). The beds are exceptionally comfortable, the 4 pillows per bed with the little markers for firm or soft & the little details make for an inviting good night's rest. *We ordered a very large breakfast to be brought up from the restaurant below- it was both good & reasonal in room service price. The rooms are moderate in size, I'm sure they offer larger suits, we had a basic 2 bed oceanview room. **Oh, I almost forgot the best part the "View"... We got an 'ocean-view' versus 'oceanfront', can be huge difference staying on the beach, the view was very nice, true the ocean front would have been awesome & of nothing but sand & sea... But it was very nice & for me an amazing experience!!! Overall, staying here was a great experience. I cannot stress enough the importance & difference the security and key only entrance from the beach makes!!!! They care about their property & their guest & it shows! A word of wise when booking a hotel *google the name of the hotel & see if it has been in the news*! **People have had criminals literally climb from a balcony separated by a wall onto their balcony!! I stayed in a hotel where my medication was taken from my room while I was visiting the beach, where I also became scared by a fellow tenant but when I tried to call the front desk or security my room phone would not allow me to dial out, scared with my family asleep I then googled the hotel and turns out it's the residence of prostitute & other shady activity- all trying to save money at a cheaper hotel & not googling it meant a vacation & memory of Daytona Beach just awful! Daytona Beach, like all tropical beach cities, is plagued with crime & danger- it is very real & do not be naive!!! Be observant & cautious at all times! Daytona Beach can be a very enjoyable experience if you do some homework prior & exercise safety precautions.

Reviews.Title: “Way better than a regular Holiday inn, Very Nice!!”
Reviews.Author: Bedoya86
Reviews.Content: I was in the area and i decided to stay for the night, i went to the main lobby at the holiday inn, and Chris took excellent care of me, first He let me see a room, and it was amazing, beautiful room, ocean view, huge balcony, extremely clean, and the hotel is very beautiful, the pool is awesome. It is a hidden treasure this place, my wife and I have and amazing time. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Far better than a "Holiday Inn!"”
Reviews.Author: jalaw
Reviews.Content: After finding the hotel I booked online was a total mess, I drove down the road looking for a better place. Luckily, I found this place! CLEAN. Never seen so many people cleaning all the time. QUIET. Slept well. EXCELLENT STAFF - friendly, went the extra mile and made the stay far more enjoyable. GREAT RESTAURANT. Yes, a restaurant attached to the hotel, that was actually good! Complaints? My stay was too short.

Reviews.Title: “One of the nicer hotels in town”
Reviews.Author: keb1234
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for three nights while working in the area. The hotel is right on the beach with a decent pool area too. I was by myself but the room would have been large enough for a family. Room was clean and staff was friendly. Free parking. Will probably stay here again when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel With Beautiful Views of the Atlantic”
Reviews.Author: 4KIDSMOM69
Reviews.Content: This is one of the nicest hotels on Daytona Beach. We were lucky enough to get a room on the 4th floor with a balcony and a direct view of the Atlantic Ocean. Parking was no problem. We were able to park in the hotel lot behind the hotel, and kept our car in the same spot the entire stay. The beach is easy to access from the pool deck. Upon check-in we were told that the pool was heated. The Atlantic Ocean was warmer than that pool!! There are restaurants and shopping at the Ocean Walk Shoppes one mile south of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Week on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: DunedinDale
Reviews.Content: We had a King suite with jacuzzi and balcony overlooking the ocean. The room was very comfortable, the view of the beach was terrific, and our stay very pleasant. The restaurant was nice, with outdoor seating available by the pool overlooking the beach. The staff was very friendly and helpful. he loocation was perfect within easy walking distance of everything we needed, including the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: luvitLakeNormanNC
Reviews.Content: Again very spur of the moment stay, We stayed in room 508 ocean front room. We found it to be a little pricey for this time of year. $160.00 a night. Our room was very clean, no complaints here. Staff was extremely nice and helpful. We were there for the night and had a very nice visit. Pool was large but there is no hot tubs at this location. The grounds at the hotel appears very nice and we did see security often on the property. King size bed with living area. Very nice room. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Lulled to sleep with banging hammers and nails...”
Reviews.Author: CoupDeGrasFL
Reviews.Content: On 8/Dec/10, a coworker and I checked in to this Holiday Inn around 8:00pm after a very long day on the road travelling the state. We had stayed here before in the past and never had a problem with the time spent there. I was in bed by 9:45pm . At approximately 10:45, I awoke to the cacophony of banging hammers and hardware supplies being moved in the room above me. The front desk failed to tell us that they were doing renovations throughout the hotel during this slow time of the year. Why would they schedule this at night and in the vicinity of occupied rooms?? The front desk’s explanation was that is they had to schedule this work at that time. REALLY??? I find that hard to believe. My coworker, in the adjoining room, also heard this noise, which lasted till around 2:30am. That will be our last time staying there and we've instructed fellow coworkers to skip this hotel when in town.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Suprised!”
Reviews.Author: allwdwfreaks
Reviews.Content: Never stayed in Daytona and assumed it was a well stayed at (read lots of stays by wild partying crowds) location. The room however was very nice, almost looked new. Possibly remodeled. Very spacious. Booked on priority points which usually means yo get what they give you as far as room choice, but they automatically upgraded us to an ocean view room. Staff was very friendly and well prepared for our arrival. Received bonus items like buy-one-get-one drinks at the pool bar and % off dining at restaurant. Nice facility with pool, nice seating area outside, pool side bar/grill. Looks like this would be a good location for sun and fun (we stayed in November). The walk to the shops and activities hub was much longer than it looked. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, right on the beach!!!”
Reviews.Author: KNC07
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very clean. The rooms are very spacious. The staff was friendly and is located right on the beach!!! They have a very nice pool and poolside bar as well as restuarant. I would recommend for anyone to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jase2153
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for the Coke Zero 400 in July. Found this a nicer hotel compared to previous hotels I have stayed at in Daytona. Great crowd of guests for the NASCAR weekend. Only downsides it was a fair walk to shopping. I had left after this incident but heard that hotel management did deal appropriately with the guest who set off the fire alarm at 3:30am one morning for a joke.

Reviews.Title: “LOVELY, GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY, CHILD-FRIENDLY HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Louisa24
Reviews.Content: We decided to stay near to the beach for the night prior to flying back to England. We checked out a few along the coastline but some were in quite a bad state of repair and smelly - the staff mostly were so lovely. We booked 2 rooms at the Holiday Inn and had kids from 10 months to 18. Everyone was accommodated for - plenty of towels in the bathroom. Clean, fresh beds. Air con unit worked. Balcony was clean and spacious. I'm really fussy but this was a great hotel at a great price. Would love to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Not a Sweet Suite”
Reviews.Author: mpescatore
Reviews.Content: The Holiday Inn and Suites was reasonably clean, safe, and had a good location on the beach among several hotel choices. But it’s just a bit weathered, and we had enough annoyances to keep us away for another stay. Actually, the property was fine when we stayed for one night in June 2010, just not spectacular. The hotel maintained a reasonably large pool area with a private gate to the beach. There was also an on-site restaurant with outdoor bar (sorry, no free breakfast here) and a comfortable, well appointed lobby. The free high-speed Internet access was a nice touch, too. Then we got to our room – and it took long enough in the slow, small elevators. We had a king suite, with pocket doors that closed off the bedroom from the rest of the room. No balcony, but we did have a very large window to provide a nice view of the ocean. We couldn’t open said window, but we did have a nice view. The AC unit, positioned under that same window, was strong, but not strong enough to cool the entire suite when you closed the pocket doors. Which meant we had to keep the pocket doors open a bit to circulate cold air into the other area of the suite. Which pretty much negated the separate bedroom idea. Sigh. The bed was reasonably comfortable and the shower had good pressure. There were two TVs, but neither unit was HDTV. The small refrigerator in the room did not work – not the end of the world, since we only stayed one night, but it was inconvenient. Parking was annoying as well. The hotel has a very small parking lot adjacent to its building, but overflow parking is across the street. No big deal if you packed light, but packing light is not an option with a seven-month-old in tow, especially if your vacation is spread across several locations. I can’t speak to the quality of the regular rooms, but the king suite was a big disappointment. Again, this was not a bad hotel, but I think we’ll try our luck at a different spot next time we visit Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Good Staff, clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: AKMiner
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice stay at this hotel. Hotel could use a little upgrading as it is an older hotel. Rooms were clean and spacious and the beds were comfortable. It was quiet at nite which surprised us. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Pool and pool area was nice and clean. Easy access to the beach. Only complaint was with the restaurant. They were short of some of the better menu items and didn't get them in for several days. All in all a very nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected, but an average for an older beach-front hotel.”
Reviews.Author: carolinatravelgirl
Reviews.Content: We checked in late the night we arrived, and the lower floor we requested was not granted. They then gave us a complimentary upgrade a few floors lower, so I was beginning to feel better. We get upstairs with our belongings and open the door to this spacious room with a jacuzzi and small living room...but it was a smoking room. They failed to mention that part..I had to call back down (where I spoke brand new employee who just took over at the 11pm shift change) and ask for another room and we were told the only thing available was on the upper floor and that we were in fact on the smoking floor. He sent the security guard up to give us our keys to the new room and take our old keys. I'm sorry, but this guard was the creepiest looking security guard I've ever seen. Everything about him creeped me out. The whole experience was uncomfortable and inconvenient. When we finally settled in our room, it was average for an old hotel. The lobby was nice, the rooms were outdated with worn carpet and just a general older feel. Nothing was disgusting-dirty or anything, I would just much rather stay in a new Holiday Inn Express than this older type of Holiday Inn. We canceled our additional nights at that hotel and went up to another beach where we had a fantastic experience. Note: Be aware that if the hotel is full, you may have to park in a lot across the street from the hotel. There is not a lot of parking on site, and the clerk let us know that when we checked in.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, comfortable room with a view!”
Reviews.Author: linda810
Reviews.Content: In May 2010 my family and I stayed in an oceanfront room at the Holiday Inn in Daytona Beach. The room was very clean and comfortable, pool was very clean and the people were very friendly and helpful. We had no problems at all! The view was great and we even saw dolphins playing early in the morning! I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “daytona beach”
Reviews.Author: KathyC10
Reviews.Content: nice place , right on the beach , with a beach side bar

Reviews.Title: “Gator Bowl Trip”
Reviews.Author: Blue_Cyclone
Reviews.Content: After reviewing many hotels throughout the Daytona Beach area we settled on this Holiday Inn because it had so much to offer. When we checked in we initially had some difficulties with our assigned room but it was after midnight and we were exhausted. The next morning we spoke with the manager, Marta, who was very helpful and immediately switched us to a new room that we were very happy with. We had an oceanfront two queen room with the usual. Room was clean but could have used a little TLC and was what I would consider on the small side. Minor maintenance issues included things such as small areas of paint peeling or a spot here and there in the carpet. We ate at the hotel restaurant and was very pleased with the portions and cost of the meal. We didn't use the pool due to the cool weather but did access the beach. We were on the sixth floor oceanfront and had excellent views of the ocean along with magnificent sunrises and sunsets. One thing we did notice is how clean the hotel was overall. Seems like there was always a staff member cleaning something! Hotel offers free wifi and free parking. Also has an indoor/outdoor lounge. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Overall our experience was very positive but I did feel the hotel was overpriced for the size of rooms it offered.

Reviews.Title: “Worth it!!”
Reviews.Author: TravelersAlot
Reviews.Content: Clean room, good location and great service. The BBQ dinner buffet was very good and the bartender Patty in the lounge was fantastic, what a pistol!, very personable and attentive to everyones needs.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: GoneagainfromAtlanta
Reviews.Content: We have been to Daytona many times over the years and usually have had a hard time finding a hotel with decent service. We found it finally at the Holiday Inn. It is an older hotel that has been properly renovated and is well managed. Check in was quick and professional. The room was very clean and had a great ocean view. The bathroom is updated with tile and granite and new fixtures. The bedding is the new white comforter bedding and was clean. No nasty bedspreads or carpet here. The pool was a good size and was clean. I noticed staff always cleaning something. This is a well run property which is a gem for Daytona Beach. Good location between the pier and Ormond Beach. We would stay here again. Thanks to the staff for taking care of us!

Reviews.Title: “Not Sure What More You Could Ask For”
Reviews.Author: vtxriders
Reviews.Content: Good Location - within walking distance to pier, shopping and food. Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was typical for Holiday Inn. No frills but consistent with expectations and clean. Priority benefits were great - 15% off bill in cafe. Food was decent, nothing spectacular, but good. We had both breakfast and dinner there. The poolside bar was nice but not overly active.

Reviews.Title: “Glad we went here....”
Reviews.Author: FaLei
Reviews.Content: We decided to arrive at daytona beach without booking a room and "wing it". We actually paid for and checked into a room and after sitting there for about 2 mins I couldnt bear to stay there, it was horrible. We drove down the street and decided to run into the Holiday Inn and price that......the price was well worth the room. It was spacious, clean rooms with amazing views, clean pool, beautiful grounds, parking and one staicase away from the beach :) It is close to everything, gift shops, ocean walk, the pier, grocery store, restaurants, etc. I would stay here again!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice layout”
Reviews.Author: SadieMarie
Reviews.Content: Returned home after a weeks stay on Daytona Beach. Had an oceanfront room on the beach just before tropical storm Hanna traveled by (120 miles offshore). Room was very reasonably priced for an oceanfront and was clean & quiet. We had a great view of the ocean,beach,pool, & courtyard from our balcony. Had heard about bad parking due to a limited sized lot around the hotel & an overflow lot across the street. We had no problem always finding a spot in the closest lot but to park across the street wouldn't have been a big deal. The road was very easy to cross even though it's 4 lanes there was limited traffic at most times of the day. The boardwalk & pier are about a mile and 1/2 down the beach which we walked daily for some exercise and people watching. The boardwalk has some resturants (Bubba Gump Shrimp), bars, and movie theater. Across the street from the boardwalk is a amusement area with go-karts,mini-golf, arcade, & waterpark. A little further down is the pier which also has a bar & resturant where you can sit & watch the ocean.The beach was relatively clean and hard packed for great walking. At night the beach was very dark as the turtle season is on & hotels aren't allowed to have lights on the beach as it confusses the turtles laying their eggs. The hotel's resturant had good breakfast that could be enjoyed out under the canopy (perfect during the rain) or good pizza we had sitting at the outside bar in the evening.The outside bar & eating area have a large roof over it so you won't get wet or bake in the sun. The pool is large with a deep end(10') with plenty of loungers. Also there is a sunbathing area off to one side with tables & chairs. We had some dificulty with the front desk. Check in & out were problem free. When we attempted to print our boarding passes out on their computer the printer was broken with no sign indicating such. The computer was also set up that every 5 minutes it would just shut down so you had to work fast or lose everything you were doing. There was a problem getting pool towels from the front desk sometimes as they had no one picking up the used ones laying around the pool until late at night. It took 3 days to finally get a Showtime guide for the TV so we knew what was on. The elevators were extremely slow also so many times we took the stairs(we were on the 5TH floor). All in all we would stay there again. Other than some front desk staff & problems it was a great place to stay. We will return in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Always enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: PCFMilwaukee
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Holiday Inn beachside several times in the past 3 years. Although a bit pricey, it is worth every cent because of the peace of mind I get. The hotel is clean, ocean side balcony offers a great view, pool area is wonderful and the staff are ALWAYS very nice. Rooms are spacious and clean with all the amenities you would expect in a highly rated hotel. I would not think of going elsewhere especially considering the many "not so nice" hotels in this area.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place”
Reviews.Author: Parkman221
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 4 nights in a suite (#300). It was great. The room looked directly onto the beach (ok I had to look over about 16 cars directly below) and the view was fabulous. The room was large and had the whirlpool tub and king bed. The room was very clean, the staff very friendly and very reasonably priced. The outdoor lounge was great and the restaurant had a decent variety and was fairly reasonble in price. It did get a little busy with kids on the weekend but you have to expect that. Also note that when they get real busy you will not get anything quickly. The staff worked hard but just a few too many people for them to handle in the restaurant and pool lounge. Parking is a like several reviews mention across the road unless you luck out. The pool was nice and there were a lot of lounge chairs on the pool deck, towels were harder to find. We also got a bonus as the Space Shuttle launch was visible from the entire area but we watched from the pool deck. From the pool deck it is down 5 or 6 steps to the beach and you are about 35 yards from the water at high tide. There is drive on access almost next door to the Holiday Inn so the beach rental guys are all right there as well as food vendors on the weekend. I will absolutely stay here again. If you stay at Holiday Inn's you will know what to expect and then some. Hope this helps and post reviews yourself so we can all learn where to go and where not to.

Reviews.Title: “Great beach, lovely pool.”
Reviews.Author: busytucker
Reviews.Content: The hotel was conveniently located right on the beautiful sandy beach. The pool was wonderful, warm and clean and towels were provided at reception. We didn't find the area very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: happycanadians4
Reviews.Content: We found the hotel to be great. We booked it after having had a bad experience at another. We were very happy to have a very clean room with plenty of storage for all of our travelling stuff and a spacious bathroom. The room was on the 6th floor and faced the beach so the view was beautiful. The cleaning staff were very friendly and helpful with anything that we needed. The pool was a nice size and clean. It was nice to be sitting on a lounger facing the beach with a drink in our hand. The only thing missing was a pool light so that you could continue swimming when it became dark. For an inhouse restaurant it was good. At least we didn't have to leave. Front desk staff were very helpful and friendly. No need to take beach towels since they are provided for you at the front desk. If you like to sleep in a dark room then take a sleeping blindfold because we only had sheers and when the sun comes up, it is very bright in the room. A very nice stary and if we return to this beach I would not hesitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Whole family loved it.”
Reviews.Author: DeeOhGee
Reviews.Content: The room was substantially larger than most 2 double bed rooms. The bathroom and closet were huge. The pool area has a complete service bar with a full menu. The kitchen closes at 2 pm, then reopens at 5 pm. The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean, the elevator slow. If you are on the 2nd or 3rd floor the stairs were much quicker. The housekeepers were mostly men. From their accents I am guessing they are on their off season from working the cruise ships. Their attention to detail showed. The location is good. It is a long walk to the main 'tourist' area of Daytona, but it is doable. The hotel did allow the time share marketers to harass people in the pool/bar area.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time!”
Reviews.Author: gramsay
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel after doing a lot of research for hotels in this area. Everything was great!. The staff was very pleasant, helpful & friendly from the desk clerk to the waitresses to the maintenance man! The room was clean, the food & drinks were reasonably priced and even occasionally parking across the street was not a problem. The towels were a little stiff but I guess they need to do something to keep people from stealing them. We had to walk far to get to the pier but it was a nice walk. I would definitly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jerry-retired
Reviews.Content: This hotel is on the beach in Daytona Beach which is the best thing about the property. Upon arrival were were greeted at the desk by a young woman who was just going thru the motions and doing her job. It was not bad but she seemed to be wishing she had another job. She told us to park across the street because the parking on the hotel property was full. When we checked at least half the on property spaces were empty. It is a bit difficult getting across the four lane highway to the parking lot across the street. The best way to do this is to walk about 150 feet to the stop light and cross when it is safe. We booked a king jacuzzi suite which had a nice view of the beach and ocean. It was very average in decor and was really nothing special. The jacuzzi only had six water jets and two could not be moved. My wife and I both found getting into the jacuzzi was hard because there was not a step up to get in. The hard wire internet conection never did work so we used the wirless from the Desert Inn which was located next door. The connection was great. We did eat one meal in the hotel and the quality and amount of food was lacking. I should have known because the place was empty both days we were there. A better choice to eat is the Olive Garden just a mile or so north of the hotel. The hotel is also located away from almost everything such as place to eat or entertainment so you must drive to everything and in Daytona parking can be next to impossible. On our next trip we will stay at another property in Ormond Beach which is higher rated and less cost. It is not a bad place to stay if you just want to go to the beach. The pool was a good size and the hotel was gererally clean.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: jlyn4182
Reviews.Content: Hotel was excellent. Staff very friendly, hotel extremly clean. We had a beautiful 6th floor ocean view room with a private balcony. Beach is right off the steps from the pool area, easy access. Restaurant was good and reasonable prices. Seaside bar was also pleasant.. Can't wait to stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: bobcat3059
Reviews.Content: Excellet hotel. I would give it 5 Stars. The rooms are exceptionably clean, large, and well maintained. Service is super and the restruant prices are definitely reasonable. Love my stay there. Will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: myboo123
Reviews.Content: I booked the Holiday Inn and Suites in Daytona, Fl through Travel Worm.com (which I do not recommend). The hotel is clean and the front desk staff are very helpful. There is limited parking and small parking spaces. Additional parking is available across the 4 lane highway but good luck getting across. The high speed internet is not wireless, but cables are provided at the front desk. The cafe is good, and the poolside bar is nice. The location of the hotel is in walking distance to the OCean Walk Shoppes and other attractions. If you book a room here, I recommend a room higher than the second story because our "ocean view" room was more like a view of the pool side bar roof. However the stay here was nice and I would come back.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, bad parking”
Reviews.Author: esjcabb
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself was very nice, with a nice clean room that was larger than expected. The staff was nice as well and the balcony was nice and relaxing. The only drawback was the parking. There are only a limited number of spaces next to the hotel, and the majority of cars must park across a four lane highway with no intersection to cross. This is not fun to cross at night. Other than this, the hotel was good and I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel ever!”
Reviews.Author: jaime337
Reviews.Content: Travelled here for a 3 day break from Orlando and wanted a few lazy days by the sea. This is the best hotel I have ever stayed in. Room was very clean and had excellent facilities, we had a balcony overlooking the beach and pool. Bar man was from friendly and looked after us very well (Man from NewYork). We only ate at the bar and the food was excellent. Also we were given free spare ribs at lunch time, which were delicious. Staff are very professional. You can walk down from the hotel straight onto the beach. Thanks for the best holiday ever. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Solid Holiday Inn”
Reviews.Author: a1scuba
Reviews.Content: I reserved a get away package on Allegiant Airline that included this hotel, rental car + flight. I called the night before and talked with a curteous front desk person who confirmed my reservation. I arrived at apx 10pm for a 3 night stay. Check in was smooth and the front desk person took time to guide me to a restaurant that was still open. (This was the week after BikeToberfest so things in Daytona were a little slow.) I went to our room on the 5th floor and found that it was spacious and clean. The décor is pretty dated - mustard yellow walls. The room had a balcony that looked out on the ocean. My only complaint about the room was the bed was pretty worn out and uncomfortable. The maids were in and out without any problems - never saw them. The parking was a bit cramped in the small lot behind the hotel, but there was plenty of parking across the street. The pool, restaurant, and bar area appeared nice, but I did not use them. I'd stay at this property again! any questions e-mail me: Deltastr@aol.com

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: tjnmeandbigt
Reviews.Content: Great location, close to the boardwalk. The room was always clean, but the parking is horriable and some of the staff is rude. Somebody hit our car in the parking lot because it's so small. And of course it was a hit and run. Most of the staff are great but there are a few that act like your bothering them to answer a question. I hate that. One thing I wish they has is a kiddie pool. My little guy was to small for the big pool and it was always pretty packed because it's not that big. I would probably stay here again, but I'm not sure that it would be my first choice.

Reviews.Title: “Nice view, clean, and we would return”
Reviews.Author: eddie3558
Reviews.Content: Just a pleasant stay from start to finish. Clean room, not exceptionally well decorated, but nice. Ocean front view is very nice. Front desk was helpful upon check in. Could have a great pool bar, but very limited food menu.

Reviews.Title: “loved it very nice people at desk”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I ended up stay at this hotel for 4 nights in a suite facing the ocean and had a garden tub. Room was extremely clean and plenty of space. Front desk people were also very, very helpful Not rude at all as stated in another review maybe they just had a bad day...There was a fridge and microwave/coffee pot coffee and tea in my room. Would go back to this hotel in a heartbeat. I found that the area was safe and I am a female who was there alone did not feel unsafe walking around even at night. Loved it and get views room was worth every penny for the suite. Will be going back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Clean Hotel--”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night before returning back home from our vacation. The hotel was in a nice location, the rooms were clean and the room service was prompt and courteous. The staff at the front wasn't that friendly when we were there, but other than that everything else was fine. The swimming pool area and the pool itself was full of sand and the property was right there by the beach which was a good thing. I would definately recommend this hotel to anyone. Everything that we experienced in this hotel was fine except for some of the staff up front.

Reviews.Title: “dirty, seedy location”
Reviews.Author: Windy
Reviews.Content: We are frequent travelers and are 43 & 60. My husband and I were to stay for 2 nights and then 3 in St. Augustine. We only stayed one night. Hotel was OK but nothing special for priority club members, not even a cup of coffee in the restaurant. We were able to check in early about 1PM which was nice after traveling all day. Beach is very dirty and many hotels are badly run down. We saw hookers on the street and what appeared to be drug dealing. If you are looking for a nice family destination do not go to Daytona Beach. The room was a nice size but was dirty as well. Black mold in the bathroom. Sheets were older than me but seemed to be clean. Pool was dirty, lots of sand in it and it did not seem like they were keeping up with cleaning it. Elaine, the cocktail waitress out at the pool bar was really nice. We did not eat here, but went to Our Deck Down Under, dirty place but food good if you like plastic forks and paper plates. Check out my review for the Holiday Inn in St. Augustine. Now that is something to talk about. Very nice place and gorgeous beach. And yes there is not a lot of parking to be had in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “OK - but interesting incident”
Reviews.Author: Naheem82
Reviews.Content: This was the second time that my family stayed at this hotel. It's pretty good - the service is good and the hotel is generally clean (except the stairwell smells of stale beer and urine - probably from Spring Break, Biker Week, etc.).
