But, I wanted to echo something that was listed here before. We started off with our toilet working fine, and then the next day it would hardly work. I went to the housekeeper's cart and grabbed a plunger and went to work on the toilet. Turns out - the housekeeper had flushed a bar of soap down the toilet and it plugged up the toilet. In talking with my wife (who was a housekeeper when she was a teenager) - she said that this is an old trick to clean the toilet. So if you stay at this hotel - please watch out for this. Otherwise, this is a pretty good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Clean Beach Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Traveler05150927
Reviews.Content: After much research my family and I stayed at this hotel. I'm a very picky person when it comes to clean hotel rooms and always check the room out before we check in. The hotel room was very clean. We stayed in a oceanfront room and the view was great. The hotel was a great choice and we would recommend it. We live in Florida and visit Daytona Beach frequently, however, we never stay the night. We know first hand that most hotels/motels there will not meet our expectations so we are happy to have found a hotel that did and one we will use in the future. If you're looking for luxury this is not the hotel for you but if you want a nice clean room with great views this Holiday Inn is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice-I would return”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This turned out to be a pleasant suprise. We had left another hotel due to some issues, and found this. It was clean, and well maintained. The staff was very friendly and accomodating. The rooms were up-to-date and very clean. They have an indoor/outdoor bar, as well as a restaurant on-site. We were very please, and it helped to turn a potentially bad vacation into a very pleasant one. I would definately return.

Reviews.Title: “Recommend this beach hotel”
Reviews.Author: HawkItraveler
Reviews.Content: If you're going to Daytona Beach, I would highly recommend this hotel. Considering this is a beach hotel, it is kept remarkably clean. The rooms are spacious and a refridgerator is provided. The pool deck and pool are very nice and the view of the ocean is outstanding. The staff is very friendly. The only thing that would have been nice is if they sprayed the sand off of the pool deck each morning as it was pointless to try and rinse your feet as they were covered in sand as soon as you walked away and so many seemed to rinse their feet in the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Still a Great Place to Stay 3 Years Later!”
Reviews.Author: PleaseTakeMe2
Reviews.Content: My husband, three kids, and I stayed at the Holiday Inn Suites for a 5-day stay the week of May 23rd to beat the Memorial Day holiday vacationers. We have stayed at the Holiday Inn for the past three years. I must say that the hotel has maintained its cleanliness and family atmosphere well. I was tempted to book at the Ocean Walk for the additional kids activities and pools, but after reading a few of the reviews on this site, I decided that I'd rather not chance our vacation by having a room that we may not enjoy as much. So, we booked again in familiar territory. As with previous stays, parking is at a minimum. If you get lucky enough to get a parking space at the hotel, I don't suggest that you go take an evening drive anyplace because when you return, you will be parking across the street at the hotel's overflow lot. The room was modern and clean, and the maid service was good during our stay. Unlike previous visits, there was no live band in the courtyard this time; however, we appreciated the peace and quiet of the afternoons without it. I would have to say that the only complaint that I had during this particular stay was with the front desk staff. Although very friendly, they appear to get younger and a little more nonchalant every year. My husband needed to receive a fax at the hotel and needed the fax number. To his surprise, the two young men at the front desk were rolling around on the floor behind the front desk wrestling and didn't notice that they had guests waiting! After a few minutes they noticed that we needed assistance and dusted themselves off, straightened out their uniforms - only to give us the wrong number!!! All in all, a very good stay. We plan to book the Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Birthday stay, Toilet no flush, was smoking on nonsmoking floor stunk”
Reviews.Author: gspraker
Reviews.Content: We checked out the room, it smelled good and was clean... When leaving for dinner we used the bathroom would not flush right.. They came with plunger and then left. We came back and still not working right. Plus place smelled like smoke, this on a non smoking floor.. In the room smoke came in from other room during the night.. The bathroom if you needed to do a #2 you had to go to the lobby 6 floors down.. If you said anything at the desk about the room, they would look at you like something wrong with us... To find out the people were smoking all night in the next room.. Everytime we saw someome leave there room there was still someome in there. they would put out the donot disturd sign.. so cleaning could not enter the room.. Talked to management next morning, said they could do nothing about someone smoking in, nom smoking rooms.. Said would fix the bill and only charged $75.00 . We had breakfast there before leaving, it was good, was a weekend buffet $7.99. The only good thing about the place to me.. At least the bathroom was close after breakfast, the same bathroom we had to use all night.. To me if its a non smoking floor thats they way it should be..

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: BAB2
Reviews.Content: We just returned from spending two nights at the Holiday Inn in Daytona Beach during our spring break. Since I never stay anywhere without reading these reviews, I thought I'd write one for those thinking of staying here. I thought it was a great place to stay, and I'll definitely stay here again when I return to Daytona. The hotel lobby is very pretty. The rooms were nice and had a beautiful balcony overlooking the ocean. Our room was not cleaned until late the second day, but I know they were very busy. The pool area was gorgeous. It was very large and clean. We loved the outside bar! The bartenders made great drinks and were so nice. We'd go down and have a drink and just listen to the ocean in the evening. You can also get good food from outside. I hope to stay more than two nights next year on spring break. You will definitely not be disappointed if you decide to stay here.

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Daytona Beach
HotelInfo.Address: 930 North Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
